descript.abstract: This is a compilation of Emergency Service Zones for all 8 metro counties. This dataset will help identify which public safety entity (PSAP, Fire, EMS, or Law Enforcement) response area.
descript.purpose: For identifying and allocating public safety entities for emergency response
descript.supplinf: 8 County metro area (Anoka, Carver, Chisago, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington)

timeperd.current: This is dataset is fluid and is subject to change as annexations and consolidations occur

theme.themekey: Emergency Service Zones, ESZ, Emergency Service Numbers, ESN, PSAP Boundaries, Fire Department Boundaries, Police Boundaries, EMS Boundaries

idinfo.useconst:
By acceptance of this data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including the liability disclaimer, whenever the user transmits or provides the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user.
We recommend that other interested parties download this dataset from the Data Finder web site (www.datafinder.org) to ensure that the most current data is obtained.

browse.browsed: Shows example of Emergency Zone Data catagorized with PSAP data field.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

attracc.attraccr: Attribute Accuracy is good, however work is in progress to ensure the data is of the highest accuracy

dataqual.logic: Logical Consistency is very High, however there may be miniscule gaps between ESZ polygons. Future work will eliminate these...if they exisit.
dataqual.complete: Data is complete but consolidations of PSAPs and annexations by municpal and county entities make this a fluid dataset. Update occur as needed.

horizpa.horizpar: This dataset boundaries have been drawn according to PSAP suggestion and work is being done at this time to ensure the boundaries are in accordance to the Master Street Address File

procstep.procdesc: This dataset is a compliation of data provided by existing PSAPs and some county GIS offices.

overview.eaover:
Contains the following;
PSAP - Public Safety Answering Point (911 office)
Fire - Fire Department
EMS - Emergency Medical Services
LawEnforc - Law Enforcement (police or Sheriff)

distinfo.distliab: Distributor is NOT Liable for any inaccuracies in this dataset.

digtinfo.formname: Arc/INFO, Geodatabase, Shapefile or graphic Image
